title: Figure, "Porcelain Factory Worker", 1929
markings: underside: Dmitrov mark stamped in orange; 1781 incised in clay.
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Woman standing, with legs spread, holding on top of her head a board with stacks of ceramic dishes; she wears white cap and dress; stands on rectangular base.

tombstone.epitaph:
Figure, "Porcelain Factory Worker", 1929.
1929. Porcelain (bisque), enamel. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-161.
